Subject: License scavenging / removal of old devices
Description:
Hi, we have looked through the options within the system Web UI and also have checked your documentation but have not found an answer. The questions below relate to licensing and stale/offline devices.

We are licensed for 1000 computers, does the system automatically remove devices that have not contacted the server within a set period? If so, how long does a device need to be offline before it is removed? Can this time limit be changed?

Are licenses only assigned if a computer is showing as 'Online' within the tool?
Solution_Comment__c: THe customer confirmed that we can close the ticket after I replied to his questions regarding to licensing.
